summary: Markiplier for all your Markiplier needs, requires Racemenu, the old Full version of KS Hairdos, and The Art of Beard.
descriptionHtml:
[left][size=4]Markiplier Racemenu Preset

[/size][img]https://68.media.tumblr.com/bf283d0a2cba2f17f3188e0bca609987/tumblr_on845pbzh71vtoed6o1_1280.jpg[/img]

[b][size=5]
UPDATE IS COMING VERY SOON [/size]
[size=5]I've since made more tweaks which I believe are a little more accurate, I just need to do some more comparisons first
[/size]

[size=3][u][color=#e06666]Installation[/color][/u]

[/size][size=3]Place the file in your Presets folder -  G:\Steam\steamapps\common\skyrim\Data\SKSE\Plugins\CharGen\Presets
The Preset should now be available in the Racemenu Preset section under the name 0_Markiplier.
[/size][/b][color=#ffff00][size=4]Race is Nord
[/size][/color]
[u][color=#e06666]Requirements[/color][/u]

[size=2] Ks Hairdos - The full version can be found [url=http://www.girlplaysgame.com/2015/03/05/skyrim-ks-hairdos-400-download-mirror/]here[/url], hairstyle used is 0Unchained 
The Art of Beard - Beard used is TAoBBeard07, found [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72961/?]here[/url]
Racemenu -  to load the preset, found[/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?][size=2] here[/size]
[/url]
[u][b][color=#e06666]Not required but recommended[/color][/b]
[/u]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64592/?] Markiplier Unrelenting Force Shout - BLACKSMITH by [b]ExoGoD696[/b] [/url]- Now that you're Markiplier, you probably wanna sound like Markiplier. This mod replaces the Unrelenting Force shout with "WHERE'S THE BLACKSMITH?!?!"
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21232/?] Skyrim - Glowing Eyes v4 by [b]dumle35[/b][/url] - I use these eye  textures for my Darkiplier screenshots, one of my all time favourite mods.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12252/?] Blue Jeans T-shirts and Singletsby [b]Andrew Clements and Nancy Krantz[/b] [/url]  - The shirts I use for my Googleplier screenshots, note that mine are a re-texture and they can be found[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84189/?] here[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61325/?] Hit Get DANDY -False Mustache for Skyrim- by [b]AltheaR [/b][/url]- The Pink moustache in my screenshots is a re-texture for personal use only and I do not have permission to upload it.
[b][color=#ff0000]
[/color][/b][b][color=#e06666]For Followers - [/color]
[/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54509/?] Familiar Faces by Verteiron [/url] - This mod turns your player characters into followers in game without the need for modding yourself, you can have multiple from different saves and it's honestly just great I can't recommend this enough.


[size=5][color=#f1c232][b][u]Permissions 
[/u][/b](Please submit screenshots and videos!! I'd love to see what you do with this!)
You can use this for screenshots, videos, whatever you want really but please refrain from doing anything pornographic and NSFW, remember that Mark Fischbach is a real person who has made it clear that he does not approve of that form of content.[/color]
[/size]

[size=5]Author Notes[/size]
[size=3] 22/03/2017 - I have a functioning Follower Version but creation kit is an asshat and he has an incurable case of the grey-face bug, I'll be remaking him as soon as possible but since I'm a complete noob I'm not entirely sure which files I'll need to upload, any help and advice appreciated!
26/03/2017 - I didn't really expect people do show interest in this, so thank you so much for downloading 8'^)[/size][/left]
author: NilrythVendain
